isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1991) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - CRANKCASE PRESSURE ORIFICED RESTRICTOR TOOL (ZTSE-4146)

svcproc.title: CRANKCASE PRESSURE ORIFICED RESTRICTOR TOOL (ZTSE-4146)
svcproc.para: This restrictor (Figure 4.9) has an integral oil fill cap, which provides nearly effortless set-up when performing a crankcase pressure test on the 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine.

The restrictor is used to measure combustion gas flow out of the engine breather and is used with Model 200 Pressure Test Kit (ZTSE-2239). 1989 and later model year engines also require the use of the Crankcase Restrictor Tool (ZTSE-4284) . Refer to Figure 4.10.

important.para: PRESSURE READINGS OBTAINED WITH THIS RESTRICTOR MUST NOT BE USED AS THE MAIN SOURCE OF ENGINE CONDITION. OIL CONSUMPTION TREND DATA MUST ALSO BE USED IF THE PRESSURE READINGS ARE BEYOND THE SPECIFIED LIMITS. NEITHER CHANGES IN OIL CONSUMPTION TRENDS NOR CRANKCASE DIAGNOSTIC PRESSURE TRENDS CAN ESTABLISH A SPECIFIC COMPONENT PROBLEM BUT ARE ONLY INDICATORS THAT SOME PROBLEM EXISTS.
